pageContext.claim: “We spend billions and billions of dollars a year protecting Saudi Arabia.”
pageContext.analysis: The U.S. provides less than $1 million in direct aid to Saudi Arabia and does not have troops in that country. Trump is likely referring to the U.S. military presence in the Persian Gulf. Those troops are not there solely to protect Saudi Arabia but to project U.S. strength in an area of interest and safeguard the U.S. oil supply.
